name: Satoshi•Fund
body:
# What is Satoshi•Fund?

Blockchain Asset Management. The first Satoshi•Fund product is Satoshi•Pie

# What is Satoshi•Pie?

Satoshi•Pie is a blockchain traded fund managed by Satoshi•Fund. It was created on 9 of May 2016. Initial capital is $50k was provided by asset managers: 21hipster, cybermonetarist and creator. Satoshi•Pie grew in a month to $0.5M under management. The base price increased by 40% over the past month in US dollars and by 12% in bitcoins. Initially it was for friends only. But due to increasing demand we begin to slowly rolling out it to a broader public.

# Information Disclosure

- [Draft of paper](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QbzZyAgev5On7hrBFCq1t4TAsfFoDeSRjBf-gZpzWVE/edit?usp=sharing). Feel free to discuss it
- [Accounting to audit](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1CMoQEXTPKjay9SgiNyvjsAkQAGD2wNYfN7pYfI2FEro/edit?usp=sharing). Feel free to recommend transparency improvements
- [Net Asset Valuation](https://cyber.fund/@satoshi_pie) at cyber•Fund
- [SPIES tokens at cyber•Fund](https://cyber.fund/system/SatoshiPie)
- [SPIES tokens at Cryptofresh](http://cryptofresh.com/a/SPIES)

# How to Invest?

Read [this article](https://steemit.com/blockchains/@hipster/how-to-invest-in-satoshipie) on Steem.
